template<typename FloatType >
TransformT<FloatType, RotationMatrix> metapod::Spatial::TransformT< FloatType, RotationMatrixTpl< FloatType > >::toPointFrame ( const Vector3d &  p) const [inline]

Specialization of transform multiplication.

Compute transform cXa from bXa, with cXb a translation defined by the vector Pb (expressed in frame b).

In a nutshell:

cXb == TransformT(Eye, Pb) cXa == cXb * bXa == bXa.toPointFrame(Pb)

Reimplemented from metapod::Spatial::internal::TransformT_helper< FloatType, RotationMatrixTpl< FloatType > >.
